name: Colorful Notion Dashboard
description: Colorful Notion DashboardDuplicate this to your Notion Workspace.Note: You will have to create your own (free) versions of all charts and widgets from the urls below:Weather, Clock, Calendar, Quote Widgets from : https://widgetbox.appLife Progress Widget from : https://indify.coCharts from: https://notioncharts.ioGraphics from : https://lottiefiles.com/Tracker/Counters from : https://getkairo.com/notion-blocks
